data.name: ClearExportCache_Description
data.value: This operation will clear all export cache data. Next export will take more time.

data.name: RemoveExportCacheConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear export cache? All generated export files will be removed from the server and will NOT be available for download.

data.name: RemoveExportCacheFail
data.value:
Export cache cannot be cleared at the moment. Please try again later.
Possible reasons: * An export file is being generated. * Generated export file is being downloaded. * Removing of generated export file is blocked by another program. * etc.

data.name: RemoveExportCacheGeneratingFail
data.value: Export cache cannot be cleared in the current moment. An export file is being generated.

data.name: RemoveExportCache_Warning
data.value: Warning! This is an irreversible action

data.name: RegeneratePasswordConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to create a new password? The new password will be applied to all exported data files produced from now on.

data.name: MobileAppSettings_Description
data.value: Some specific settings by android version of Interviewer/Supervisor application

data.name: AllowInterviewerUpdateProfileDesc
data.value: Allow enumerators to update their contact information in their account profile

data.name: AllowWebInterviewEmailNotificationsDesc
data.value: Allow respondents to web interviews to request emails with links to resume started interviews (effective if bulk email service provider is set up)

data.name: LogoNotUpdated
data.value: Company logo was not updated. Please provide a valid image

data.name: ChangeStateConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to change the export file security settings? All export data files will be protected by a password.

data.name: ChangeStateDisabledConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to change the export file security settings? The exported data files will no longer be protected by a password.

data.name: ExportEncryption_Description
data.value: Check 'Enable encryption' checkbox to protect the export data archives by encrypting them with the provided password. Change password by pressing the circular arrow button. After encryption, only people who know the password can open the exported data.

data.name: GlobalNoteSettings_Description
data.value: Specify text in the 'Global note' field to be shown on the top of every screen on the server.

data.name: LogoSettings_Description
data.value: Company logo is an image that appears on the server login page and on the login page of the Interviewer app.

data.name: LogoSettings_Description1
data.value: Click the 'Choose file' button to upload an image from your computer to the server to be used as a logo image. Then click 'Save' button.

data.name: GlobalNoteClearingConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete global note?

data.name: AutoUpdateDescription
data.value: If checked then only latest version of Interviewer/Supervisor application can synchronize with Headquarters

data.name: PartialSynchronizationDescription
data.value: When enabled, interviewer tablets will send answers in noncompleted interviews to Headquarters

data.name: GeographyQuestionAccuracyInMetersDescription
data.value: Set accuracy in meters for geography question

data.name: GeographyQuestionPeriodInSecondsDescription
data.value: Set period in seconds for geography question

data.name: EmailProvider_NoneDescription
data.value: Invitation messages for web interviews are not sent to the respondents by Survey Solutions.

data.name: EmailProvider_AmazonDescription
data.value: Configure the parameters to access Amazon SES below. More information on usage of Amazon SES with Survey Solutions is available

data.name: EmailProvider_SendgridDescription
data.value: Configure the parameters to access SendGrid below. More information on usage of SendGrid with Survey Solutions is available

data.name: EmailProvider_SendTestEmailResult
data.value: An example of invitation email was sent successfully

data.name: EmailProvider_PageDesc
data.value: Set up bulk email service provider. Configure how the invitations for web interviews will be sent.

data.name: EmailProvider_SenderHelp
data.value: Email address of the sender that will appear in the FROM field of the incoming messages.

data.name: EmailProvider_ReplyAddressHelp
data.value: Email address where the replies from the invitees may be sent (default is the sender email address.)

data.name: EmailProvider_SenderNameHelp
data.value: Name of the sender that will appear in the FROM field of the incoming messages.

data.name: EmailProvider_AddressHelp
data.value: Current postal address of the sender.

data.name: EmailProvider_AwsAccessKeyIdHelp
data.value: You can find the AWS account ID from AWS Management Console

data.name: EmailProvider_AwsSecretAccessKeyHelp
data.value: Found in Security Credentials at AWS Management Console

data.name: EmailProvider_AwsRegionHelp
data.value: Region for the AWS Management Console

data.name: EmailProvider_AwsRegion_Unknown
data.value: Selected unknown region. Please check it.

data.name: EmailProvider_SendGridApiKeyHelp
data.value: You can find it on API Keys page under SendGrid settings menu item

data.name: EmailProvider_SendTestEmailMessage
data.value: Send yourself a test email message to verify that the bulk email service is functional and to get a preview of what the respondents will receive.

data.name: EmailProvider_SettingsSavedSuccessfully
data.value: Email service configuration was saved successfully.

data.name: DeviceNotificationsDescription
data.value: When enabled devices will notify owners about changes and actions to be taken
